articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Volkswagen posts 37% drop in first-quarter profit, says Trump tariffs could weigh on outlook - CNBC
articles.description: Europe's biggest carmaker reported operating profit of 2.9 billion euros ($3.3 billion) for the first three months of the year.
articles.content:
German auto giant Volkswagen on Wednesday reported a substantial drop in first-quarter profit as the carmaker navigates the disruptive impact of U.S. tariffs on the global car industry.

articles.title: Vega-C rocket launches European forest-monitoring 'Biomass' satellite to orbit (video) - Space
articles.description: Liftoff occurred at 5:15 a.m. ET on Tuesday (April 29).
articles.content:
A European forest-monitoring satellite headed toward orbit from South America early Tuesday morning (April 29).
